mapper.select:
SELECT USER_ID,USER_NAME,
PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE FROM T_USER WHERE IS_EFFECTIVE='1'
mapper.insert: insert into T_USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, USER_EMAIL, COMPANY_NAME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{password,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=OTHER})

update T_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=OTHER},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=OTHER},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
